attributes.action: Stop the repainting of Boris Johnson's plane (at a cost of £900,000)
attributes.additional_details: In a time when many people are facing uncertainty over jobs, the highest levels of poverty ever seen, and chronic NHS underfunding is taking place - it is unfair to the tax paying public of this country for the government to spend close to £1million painting an aircraft.
attributes.background: It has been reported by various mainstream media outlets that the plane use to transport the prime minister and royal family is set to be re painted, at a cost of circa £900,000. This is simply unacceptable, and a massive waste of public money. These plans must be scrapped.

rejection.details:
By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.

We understand that you're also concerned about public services. You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead:
